summary: Drummer Stanley Maxton moves to Los Angeles with dreams of opening his own club, but falls in with a gangster and a nightclub dancer and ends up accused of murder.
cast: Mickey Rooney|Sally Forrest|William Demarest|James Craig|Kay Brown|Louis Armstrong|Louis Armstrong and His Orchestra|Tommy Rettig|Tom Powers|Jonathan Cott|Tommy Farrell|Myrna Dell|Jacqueline Fontaine|Vic Damone|Monica Lewis|Joel Allen|Don Anderson|Bette Arlen|Barney Bigard|Paul Bradley|Dolores Castle|Carmen Clifford|Cozy Cole|Fred Datig Jr.|Bert Davidson|Lester Dorr|Tay Dunn|Ward Ellis|Sam Finn|Dan Foster|Robert Foulk|Alex Frazer|Sig Frohlich|Fred Graham|Don Haggerty|Sherry Hall|Earl 'Fatha' Hines|Earle Hodgins|Shep Houghton|Jane Howard|Larry Hudson|Frank Hyers|Joyce Jameson|Donald Kerr|Art Lewis|Samuel London|Robert Malcolm|John Maxwell|Bert May|John McGuire|Harold Miller|Roger Moore|Monty O'Grady|Tom Quinn|Jack Regas|Jeff Richards|Carl Saxe|Jeffrey Sayre|Lee Scott|Arvell Shaw|Helen Spring|William Tannen|Jack Teagarden|Russell Trent|Dee Turnell|Wilson Wood
title: The Strip
